title: Loading Screen portraits is black
body:
When I load the game it loads fine but the portraits of the champions are pitch black
Does anyone have a solution?

replies.body: Same I can't see my new border or any of my skins splash art{{champion:105}}
Omg same problem.... RIOT EXPLAIN US {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
same here how i fix it ?!!
Bump! Same thing happened to me! How do you fix it?

I have been experiencing the same issue as well, I can see the mastery levels, champion names, skin names, summoner spells etc., but I can not see the character portraits it just shows a black box where all the champs should appear a vs.. and then another black box.{{champion:33}}
Bump x2 can someone please explain how to fix this!
I have the exact thing! I just got gold and my splash and borders are black!!! How do I fix?
SAME! IT TILTS ME TO NOT SEE MY BORDER OR SPLASH
